title: The Woman at the Bar
description: A nationwide manhunt is launched after a woman dubbed the “killer grandma” goes on the run through the Gulf Coast. Dennis Murphy has chosen this episode as one of his most memorable episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
